mapper.select: select cb.id, cb.tag_id, cb.block_type, t.name output, ti.name input, do.scan_value from oms.control_block cb join digital_output do on cb.id=do.tag_id join tag t on cb.id=t.id join tag ti on cb.tag_id = ti.id order by 4

select cb.id, cb.tag_id, cb.block_type, t.name output, ti.name input, ao.scan_value from oms.control_block cb join analog_output ao on cb.id=ao.tag_id join tag t on cb.id=t.id join tag ti on cb.tag_id = ti.id order by 4
